name: Snapp'd
description:
"Snappy" Physics Platformer created in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2021, with the theme "Joined Together"

Mechanics based on creating tension in a rope and Snapping it together. When you get that first long distance snap, your first thought will be "slick."

Controls are explained in game.

Tools: Unity, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Procreate, Garageband, Audacity.

Original art and game assets by Jasmine Kay Art.

https://jasminekayart.com/
